idea-plugin.name: Base16 Grayscale Light
idea-plugin.vendor: Alexandre Gavioli (https://github.com/Alexx2/), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Grayscale Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Alexandre Gavioli (https://github.com/Alexx2/). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
